text: Humberlito Borges Teixeira or simply Borges (born October 5, 1980 in Salvador), is a Brazilian retired footballer who played as a striker. ==Club statistics== Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Cup Cup Total Total Season Club League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Japan Japan Japan League League Emperor's Cup Emperor's Cup Total Total 2006 Vegalta Sendai J2 League 41 26 2 1 43 27 Country Japan Japan 41 26 2 1 43 27 2011 Santos FC Série A 31 23 0 0 31 23 Brazil Brazil 31 23 0 0 31 23 Total Total Total 48 32 2 1 50 33 ==Honours== ===Club=== São Paulo *Campeonato Brasileiro Série A: 2007, 2008 Grêmio *Campeonato Gaúcho: 2010 Santos *Campeonato Paulista: 2012 Cruzeiro *Campeonato Brasileiro Série A: 2013, 2014 *Campeonato Mineiro: 2014 América Mineiro *Campeonato Mineiro: 2016 ===International=== Brazil * Superclásico de las Américas: 2011 ===Individual=== *J2 League Top scorer: 2006 *Campeonato Brasileiro Série A Top scorer: 2011 ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Salvador, Bahia
title: Humberlito Borges
